entry.title: New release for sup3r S3cret Mes5age: v0.3.0 Add support for Kubernetes with Helm
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update README.md by @eranchetz in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/75
  • Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.4.0 to 0.7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/79
  • Renewal of vault auth token by @Pratiyush05Pushkar in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/77
  • [chore] add Code Owners for the repository by @shfranc in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/80
  • Bump github.com/docker/docker from 20.10.7+incompatible to 20.10.24+incompatible by @dependabot in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/84
  • Bump github.com/opencontainers/runc from 1.1.2 to 1.1.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/81
  • Bump google.golang.org/grpc from 1.41.0 to 1.56.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/85
  • Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.7.0 to 0.17.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/86
  • (dev) Added initial version of Chart by @zeusal in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/90
  • Bump github.com/docker/docker from 20.10.24+incompatible to 24.0.7+incompatible by @dependabot in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/87

New Contributors

  • @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/79
  • @Pratiyush05Pushkar made their first contribution in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/77
  • @shfranc made their first contribution in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/80
  • @zeusal made their first contribution in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/90

Full Changelog: https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/compare/0.2.5...v0.3.0

entry.title: New release for sup3r S3cret Mes5age: v0.4.0 Repository refacto and various updates
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump github.com/opencontainers/runc from 1.1.5 to 1.1.12 by @dependabot in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/91
  • Bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.14.0 to 0.17.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/89
  • Bump google.golang.org/protobuf from 1.30.0 to 1.33.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/95
  • Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.17.0 to 0.23.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/98
  • Remove tls 1.0 and tls 1.1 by @eranchetz in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/78
  • Bump github.com/docker/docker from 24.0.7+incompatible to 24.0.9+incompatible by @dependabot in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/97
  • docs: add awsmfoss badge by @t3hmrman in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/93
  • Revert old tls PR by @jjacque in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/99
  • Refacto / update project by @jjacque in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/101

New Contributors

  • @t3hmrman made their first contribution in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/93
  • @jjacque made their first contribution in https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/pull/99

Full Changelog: https://github.com/algolia/sup3rS3cretMes5age/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0
